ooc: hello! I'm back again! summer's over and i have access to a comp again 
:):):) but can someone fill me in? I heard there was an attack on the 
maximal base going on, and the city's my character, along with a big bunch 
of maximals so i need to be filled in :)

(i'm playing it by ear for now) :):)

++Cyndro Mantle Mist Aqua Cinder Rubble Truttle+++

Checking his scanners, Cyndro detected some Decepticons heading for Maximal 
City. He smiled internally to himself, cause he can't smile externaly due to 
lack of a mouth. These guys were in for a big surprise!

Cyndro sent a few commands through his systems which caused the shields to 
flash up, reflecting the sun and acting as the barrier between harm and 
Maximal City. His various autoguns, missile launchers, and heavy turrets all 
activated and swirled in the direction of the attackers. With a brief beep 
from the top of the Maximal City, the transmission jammer activated and 
began blocking all transmission but Maximal ones for miles around. The 
Decepticons' communications were now cut off, including the one Triggerhappy 
sent to the other Decepticons; the jammer scrambled it before it got out far 
at all, although that would probably be unknown to the sender. They would 
never know how bad they would lose...

Several shots hit Cyndro's shields, but he merely laughed them off silently 
and fired back with missiles and lasers at the attackers. "Attention all 
Maximals," he said through the intercom inside Maximal City, "We are under 
attack! Lets kick some butt!"

----

Mantle and his team were in the mess hall when Cyndro's announcement came 
through. Mantle jumped up with his weapon already in his hand.

"You heard that! Let's go!" he said to his group. Cinder, Mist, Rubble, 
Aqua, and himself all ran down the hallway toward the exit and armed their 
weapons while running.

----

Truttle had been training in the holo rooms, but the announcement got his 
attention. He took out a few guns, ran off at full speed toward the exit, 
and left the holographic opponents to fight by themselves.

:):):)

ooc: i hope that wasn't too bad :)
